title: Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9619 - Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a.

Mnemonics.
No validation on the type field. The type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for the superclass), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeName.
Label could say 'Select destination type:'.
OB: The bug report does not provide any information about the current observed behavior.
EB:
I would use the title for 'Move static field(s)' and use the description for 'x fields from xx'.
Selection dialog should be initialized with the type currently entered.
SR: The bug report does not provide any steps to reproduce the issue. Please provide the steps to reproduce in order to analyze and fix the bug properly.
